data.title: Martin of Aragon
data.meta_description: Martin the Humane, also called the Elder and the Ecclesiastic, was King of Aragon, Valencia, Sardinia and Corsica and Count of Barcelona from 1396 and King of Sicily from 1409. He failed to secure the accession of his illegitimate grandson, Frederic, Count of Luna, and with him the rule of the House of Barcelona came to an end.
data.text:
King of Aragon, Valencia and Majorca from 1396 to 1410 / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
